content:
I can totally understand why you'd be drawn to watercolor painting! It's a medium that can be so evocative and expressive, and it's wonderful that you're inspired by the work of other artists.

Following watercolor artists on Instagram is a great way to stay motivated and inspired. Seeing the work of others can spark new ideas and techniques to try, and it's wonderful that you're enjoying the process of learning and experimenting.

Figuring out your own style takes time, and it's a journey that's just as important as the destination. Don't be afraid to try new things, make mistakes, and take risks – it's all part of the creative process!

What do you think you enjoy most about watercolor painting so far? Is it the unpredictability of the medium, the way the colors blend and merge, or something else entirely?

Also, have you explored different types of watercolor paper and surfaces? There are so many options out there, and each one can affect the way your paintings turn out.

Keep experimenting, and remember that the most important thing is to have fun and enjoy the process!
